I Am The Void
From the abyss I came,
A specter clad in endless night.
No light hath touched my hollow eyes,
No sound escaped my silent sight.

The Void is my cradle, my throne, my grave,
All paths lead unto me.
The last whisper before the dark,
The hand that turns the final key.
"The Seventh Gate stands ever open"
